 2021-07152021-07-08FIN, 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment made by the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada of CAROLYN ROGERS of Basel, Switzerland, to be Deputy Governor of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of seven years, effective December 15, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
